item.title: HTTP request from Obsidian notes
item.description: Are you an Obsidian user looking to elevate your note-taking experience with dynamic data integration? Look no further than APIR (api-request) – an Obsidian plugin designed to streamline HTTP requests directly into your notes. ⚡ How to Use With APIR, integrating HTTP requests into your notes is a breeze. Simply create a code-block within your note, specifying the language as req. Inside this code-block, customize parameters such as URL, method, body, headers, and more to tailor your request precisely to your needs.
